channel.title: Report other users
channel.description:
correct me if im wrong but there is no way to report other users is there?
I suggest a way to report other users for flaming/spammer/insulting you know what i mean.

item.title: Report other users
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

As long as they get solved.
but i think its time to close this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Report other users
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

All of the reports get solved in a timely manner, and that is all that matters isn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: Report other users
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:13, topic:167595”][quote author=JDB` link=topic=227026.msg1962982#msg1962982 date=1199011824]

they would be so overwhelmed with spam it would be hilarious

How would you know if someone reported someone else? Only moderators know that.

? mods would be overwhelmed with spam…

Not so much.

you know how many people spam on mopar? last time i was there 90% of it was spam 1% was useful and 9% was tutorials.
(i made up the percentages -.-)

and taharok do you have a problem with everything i say?

No I don’t have a problem with what you say and I do know around how many people spam on here. I have seen the report report forum on here before and it was barely filled.
[/quote]When you’re offline I’m online, when I’m online you’re offline.
So when I just left and solved all reports and you come there is no report left.
Usually there is one page to do now.
When someone posted a site advertisement topic around 1 page more.

A gmod is probably solving them. I solve a few occasionally, but not so often.

I solve them occasionally.

good to see some staff do their job occasionally.[/quote]
I also solve them occasionally.

Read full topic

and taharok do you have a problem with everything i say?

No I don’t have a problem with what you say and I do know around how many people spam on here. I have seen the report report forum on here before and it was barely filled.
[/quote]When you’re offline I’m online, when I’m online you’re offline.
So when I just left and solved all reports and you come there is no report left.
Usually there is one page to do now.
When someone posted a site advertisement topic around 1 page more.

A gmod is probably solving them. I solve a few occasionally, but not so often.

I solve them occasionally.[/quote]
good to see some staff do their job occasionally.

Read full topic
